report.title: Samples list for map
report.description: A very simple map for the samples in UKBMS
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id JOIN samples sp on sp.id=s.parent_id WHERE #website_filter#

column.name: fo
column.sql: case max(extract(year from o.date_start)) when extract(year from now()) then 0.6 else 0.4 end

column.name: fc
column.sql: case max(extract(year from o.date_start))when extract(year from now()) then 'red' else 'blue' end
